name: Chickpea Burger
description: This Chickpea Burger is so delicious and easy to make, no one will miss the meat! You can have these burgers ready in less than 30 minutes, making them a perfect weeknight meal.
recipeIngredient: 15-ounce can chickpeas, drained and rinsed (1 1/2 cups)
1/4 cup chopped small red onion (about 1/2 small red onion)
1/2 cup chopped cilantro (may also use parsley)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add the drained and rinsed chickpeas. Use a potato masher or fork to mash them until no whole beans remain.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add the drained and rinsed chickpeas. Use a potato masher or fork to mash them until no whole beans remain.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped red onion, garlic, cumin, salt, tahini, breadcrumbs and cilantro to the chickpeas, and stir with a large spoon until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chopped red onion, garlic, cumin, salt, tahini, breadcrumbs and cilantro to the chickpeas, and stir with a large spoon until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Form into burger shapes, about 3-4 inches wide and 1/2 inch thick.
recipeInstructions.name: Form into burger shapes, about 3-4 inches wide and 1/2 inch thick.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat 1/4 cup of oil over medium heat. Carefully place the patties on the pan, and fry for about 4 minutes, then flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes until golden brown. Alternatively, you could bake the burgers at 350 degrees for 15 minutes, then flip and bake for 15 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat 1/4 cup of oil over medium heat. Carefully place the patties on the pan, and fry for about 4 minutes, then flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes until golden brown. Alternatively, you could bake the burgers at 350 degrees for 15 minutes, then flip and bake for 15 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the pan and place on a paper towel lined plate.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from the pan and place on a paper towel lined plate.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately on buns with toppings of choice. I went with vegan mayo, arugula, tomatoes and red onion slices. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately on buns with toppings of choice. I went with vegan mayo, arugula, tomatoes and red onion slices. Enjoy!
